text: @megynkelly Contact @CDCgov and check out @DrDenaGrayson for helpful pandemic/corona info. And for the love of all things holy-like truth- speak like u comprehend that our govt is changing right before our eyes into an authoritarian regime. If this is news to you-plz check out @gaslitnation
